verses.name: Genesis 6:1
verses.text: And it came to pass, when men began to multiply on the face of the earth, and daughters were born unto them,

verses.name: Genesis 6:2
verses.text: That the sons of God saw the daughters of men that they were fair; and they took them wives of all which they chose.

verses.name: Genesis 6:3
verses.text: And the Lord said, My spirit shall not always strive with man, for that he also is flesh: yet his days shall be an hundred and twenty years.
